message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1200000.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I think it's a bit high. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of offering $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid $900000 is a bit too low for me to consider. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1100000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to be careful with my budget. I'm thinking of offering $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from the product.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, $950000 is still a bit too low for me to consider. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to be closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1150000. This is the best I can do, considering the value the product holds for me.
